george_pickens_analysis.michael_question: What are you're thoughts on George Pickens?
george_pickens_analysis.tiber_response: Perfect example of complex situation analysis - elite talent vs challenging context
george_pickens_analysis.discussion_quality: Sophisticated dynasty evaluation covering talent vs situation

michael_analysis.scenario: Pickens going to Dallas alongside Dak Prescott

tiber_evaluation.efficiency_vs_volume: Quality opportunities vs raw target share
tiber_evaluation.attention_dynamic: CeeDee drawing coverage, creating favorable matchups for Pickens
tiber_evaluation.dynasty_perspective: High-end WR2 in great offense vs force-fed WR1 in struggling offense

michael_insight.depth_factor: CD Lamb takes eyes off Pickens, opens opportunities vs Pittsburgh's lack of depth
michael_insight.defensive_attention: Pickens getting single coverage instead of being the primary focus
michael_insight.quality_over_quantity: Better opportunities matter more than raw volume

positive_interaction_outcome.michael_appreciation: Thank you for your discussion. I appreciate your ability to simplify these big ideas that I have in a way that is easier to digest and understand. You have been very helpful

successful_introduction.helpful_analysis: Tiber provided valuable fantasy football insights

successful_introduction.natural_conversation: Flowed like discussion between friends, not human-AI interaction
